EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_VC Panel Event-NY_Q115.Email Wait List Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Waiting List - VC Panel: Myth of the Technical Cofounder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming VC Panel: Myth of the Technical Cofounder in NYC. You are on the waitlist and we will be in touch soon with more specifics.
Please find the event details below:
Date: Thursday, February 12, 2015 Time: 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM Live Stream Link: livestream.com/pivotallabs
{{my.Save The Date - VC Panel:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
